select.sources.overview.title: Overview of Funds
select.sources.intro: In Tuleva, there are only index funds with low fees that invest all money into the world’s securities markets. Fund exchange is free of charge.
select.sources.free: Fund exchange is free of charge.
select.sources.select.all: Transfer my entire II pillar to Tuleva
select.sources.select.all.subtitle: Your future contributions will be directed to Tuleva and your existing funds will be transferred. Your portfolio will benefit from Tuleva’s low fees. The transfer is free of charge.
select.sources.select.all.deadline: The deadline for this fund exchange period is {periodEnding}.

membercapital.source.MEMBERSHIP_BONUS.to: As a Tuleva member, you earn an annual bonus of 0.05% of the average annual value of your pension holdings. We transfer the bonus to your Tuleva capital account, where it grows with your pension assets and earns investment returns.

target.funds.EE3600109435.title: Tuleva World Stocks Pension Fund
target.funds.EE3600109435.description: A low-cost index fund that invests entirely in stocks. The annual returns of this fund can vary sharply. However, projected long-term returns are nevertheless significantly higher than for the bond fund.
target.funds.EE3600109435.description.2: Suitable for you if you want to achieve the best long-term returns and do not plan to withdraw your entire II pillar within the next 5 years.
target.funds.EE3600109443.title: Tuleva World Bonds Pension Fund
target.funds.EE3600109443.description: A conservative index fund that invests entirely in low-risk bonds. Lower risk also means lower returns compared to the stock fund. It is impossible to combine low risk with high returns.
target.funds.EE3600109443.description.2: Suitable for you if you plan to withdraw your entire II pillar within the next 5 years and are willing to give up returns for security.
target.funds.EE3600001707.title: Tuleva III Pillar Pension Fund
target.funds.EE3600001707.description: A low-cost index fund that invests entirely in stocks. The annual returns of this fund can vary sharply, yet without consciously taking risks, achieving high returns is impossible.
target.funds.EE3600001707.description.2: Suitable for you if you want to achieve the best long-term returns and do not plan to withdraw your entire III pillar within the next 5 years.
target.funds.EE3600109435.tooltip.title: Tuleva World Stocks Pension Fund
target.funds.EE3600109435.tooltip.invest: iShares Developed World ex-Tobacco Index Fund — 8%

success.2ndPillarPaymentUpsell.content: From 2024 onwards, you can increase your II pillar contribution to as high as 6% of your gross salary, compared to the previous 2%.
success.2ndPillarPaymentUpsell.small: The higher the percentage, the faster your savings will grow. Be sure to take advantage of this opportunity.

confirmThirdPillarMandate.exchangeExisti: I wish to exchange current fund units for:
thirdPillarAgreement.termsConfirmation: I confirm that I have had the chance to view all supplementary pension funds’ terms and prospectuses and that I am acquiring units in a voluntary pension fund of my own free will. I agree to the terms of my chosen pension fund(s) and understand the risks associated with acquiring units in a voluntary pension fund. The fund manager has not assessed the suitability of the chosen pension fund for me, and I understand that my interests may therefore be less protected.
thirdPillarAgreement.signingExplanation: By clicking “sign and send“ a digitally signed application will be sent to the register *
aml.updateContactDetails: The law requires that we check our third pillar clients’ info at least once a year. Please help us in this and check your details below. Thank you!
aml.isNotPep: I confirm that I am not a politically exposed person, his/her close relative or close associate *
aml.pepTooltip: A politically exposed person (PEP) is someone who currently or in the past  has been entrusted with a prominent public function. That includes  head of state or head of government, government minister or member of parliament, important political party officials, supreme court member, member of the board of the central bank or state comptroller, ambassador, senior military officials, senior executives or members of the board of state owned corporations or international organisations. Relatives of PEPs include their spouse or person deemed equivalent to a spouse, parents, children and their spouse or persons deemed equivalent to a spouse. Close associates of PEPs include individuals who co-own a company or have any legal connection with a PEP or are in close business relations with a PEP. Persons with beneficial ownership of legal entities or arrangements known to have been founded for the benefit of a PEP are also considered close associates.
aml.isResident: I am currently or have been in the past Estonian resident *
aml.residentTooltip: I am Estonian citizen or I have/I have had an Estonian residence permit and I currently live in Estonia or one of the European Economic Area countries.

withdrawals.heading: II and III pillar withdrawals
withdrawals.subHeading: You are {age} years old and eligible to start using your accumulated pension holdings under preferential conditions.
withdrawals.subHeadingThirdPilllarReduce: You are {age} years old and eligible to start using your III pillar holdings under preferential conditions.
withdrawals.subHeadingUnderEarlyRetireme: You are {age} years old and eligible to start using your accumulated pension holdings under preferential conditions in {yearsToGo} years.
withdrawals.additionalInfoUnder55: Before the age of 60, you can withdraw money only from the III pillar when using Tuleva’s site. This is only worth doing for unavoidable expenses, as the state withholds 22% income tax from withdrawals for those under 60.
withdrawals.navigation.notEligible: You aren't 60 years old yet and can’t continue
withdrawals.withdrawalAmount.partialWith: Partial withdrawal will be subject to {taxPercent}% income tax
withdrawals.withdrawalAmount.precisePric: The exact amount depends on the price of shares.
withdrawals.withdrawalAmount.fundPension: The exact amounts depend on the price of shares.

Fund pension is tax-free if the period is equal to or longer than the recommended number of years. The recommended period is calculated based on your age and the average lifespan for men and women, published by Statistics Estonia
withdrawals.withdrawalAmount.secondPilla: You will be able to use your II pillar holdings under preferential conditions when you are 60 years old.
You will be able to use your II pillar holdings under preferential conditions in {years} years.
withdrawals.withdrawalAmount.useEntirePe: Withdraw from the entire pension holding
withdrawals.withdrawalAmount.monthlyPaym: Every month you will receive {percentageLiquidated} of fund shares. With current prices, this amounts to {paymentAmount}.
withdrawals.withdrawalAmount.fundPension: The holdings left in the fund will earn returns for the next {duration} years. When the price of the share rises or falls, the size of the payment will change accordingly.
How large can my payments grow?
withdrawals.withdrawalAmount.summary.tax: and pay income tax on it
withdrawals.withdrawalAmount.summary.par: If you withdraw money partially, your monthly fund pension payments will decrease, as there will be less money remaining in the pillar.
The bank account must be opened in Estonia and belong to you.
The entered IBAN is incorrect. An Estonian IBAN has 20 characters.
withdrawals.reviewAndConfirm.confirmAndS: I submit the following applications and am aware of their terms:
withdrawals.reviewAndConfirm.episDisclai: I am aware that AS Pensionikeskus collects and processes my personal data within the European Union to the extent specified in the Mandatory Pension Act and the Securities Register Act.
withdrawals.error.generic: Submitting withdrawal applications failed. Please contact us: tuleva@tuleva.ee
withdrawals.mandates.fundPension.secondP: Monthly fund pension payments from II pillar
withdrawals.mandates.fundPension.thirdPi: Monthly fund pension payments from III pillar
withdrawals.mandates.partialWithdrawal.d: The payment will be sent on {withdrawalDate}. It will be reflected in the income declaration. {taxPercent}% income tax will be withheld, so I will receive an estimated {estimatedWithdrawalSizeWithTax}. The exact amount will be determined at the time of selling the fund units.
withdrawals.mandates.partialWithdrawal.s: Upon submitting the application, II pillar contributions will stop from {endingDate} and cannot be restored later.
withdrawals.mandates.arrestsBankruptices: You cannot cancel the application because there is an active arrest or bankruptcy claim registered in the pension registry.
withdrawals.mandates.fundPension.recomme: Payments are for the recommended duration ({duration} years) and tax-free.
withdrawals.mandates.fundPension.yearsLe: The recommended duration is calculated based on the average years left to live according to your age. Currently, it is {duration} years.
withdrawals.mandates.fundPension.dateAnd: The first payment will be sent on {withdrawalDate} and is expected to be {paymentSize}. Amounts vary and are determined at the time of selling the fund units.
withdrawals.mandates.fundPension.cancell: I can cancel the application until {cancellationDate}.
withdrawals.mandates.fundPension.stopRes: I can stop and resume payments at any time.
withdrawals.done.heading: The application has been submitted
withdrawals.done.subHeading: We have sent the digitally signed application to your email address.
withdrawals.done.subHeading.plural: We have sent the digitally signed applications to your email address.
withdrawals.done.fundPension.dateAndSize: The first monthly fund pension payment will be sent on {withdrawalDate}.
withdrawals.done.partialWithdrawal.secon: The partial withdrawal from II pillar will be sent on {withdrawalDate}.
withdrawals.done.partialWithdrawal.third: The partial withdrawal from III pillar will be sent on within four working days.
withdrawals.done.secondPillarDisclaimer: When making withdrawals from the II pillar, contributions to your second pillar will stop permanently. To avoid this, you can cancel the withdrawals until {cancellationDate}.
capital.listings.heading: Liikmekapitali kuulutused
capital.listings.intro: Tuleva ühistu liikmed saavad liikmekapitali omavahel osta ja müüa.
capital.listings.instructions: Selleks lisa oma kuulutus või vasta olemasolevale ja esitage ühine avaldus. Ühistu juhatus vaatab saadetud avaldused iga kuu esimestel tööpäevadel üle ja kiidab tehingu heaks, kui see vastab kehtestatud korrale.
capital.listings.action.delete.error: Kuulutuse kustutamisel tekkis viga. Palun võta meiega ühendust
capital.listings.details.success.title: Sõnum on saadetud
capital.listings.details.success.info: Jää ootele, kuulutuse lisaja annab sulle loodetavasti peagi märku.
capital.listings.details.differentLangua: See kuulutus on lisatud inglise keeles, seega tõenäoliselt eeldab ostja suhtlust samuti inglise keeles.
capital.listings.details.messsage.error: Sõnumi saatmisel tekkis viga. Palun proovi hiljem uuesti või võta meiega ühendust
